document_data.name: Eagleshield
document_data.symbol: A red, spread-winged eagle over a blue sky and purple water with a gold sun
document_data.mainbody:
'''Eagleshield''' ({{Pronounce|EE|gul|sheeld|refs=

Their symbol was a spread-winged [[eagle]]. They owned a [[Eagleshield Fine Horse Leathers|tack shop]] and farm for treating ill animals in [[Amphail (village)|Amphail]], and they produced harnesses of black leather, which featured their family crest.
document_data.Base of Operations: [[File:Sea Ward-Assumbar-Cassalanter-Dezlentyr-Eirontalar Villa.png|thumb|right|270px|''Map showing the location of the Eagleshield Villa (labeled $50) ''circa'' 1372 DR.'']] The family owned [[Eagleshield Villa|a villa]] in the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]], on the northeast corner of [[Cooper Street]] and [[Feather Street]].
